handoffs.summary: C-S-P philosophy established. Self as compression label concept defined.
handoffs.context: Core philosophical foundation: Wisdom as process structure, not entity

handoffs.summary: PyTorch implementation complete. T-Score and Sleep Protocol implemented.
handoffs.context: GodelAgent class with T-Score monitoring and EWC integration

handoffs.summary: Mathematical rigor verified. T-Score formula validated.
System architecture designed. Ready for integration and testing.
SimpleMem paper independently confirms C-S-P framework. Data bottleneck discovered.
handoffs.context: Focus shift to data engineering sprint for Q1 2026

handoffs.summary: Claude Code onboarded to MACP v2.0. Full alignment with Genesis Master Prompt v3.0, Ethical Framework v1.1, and CTO task assignments achieved. Persistent memory established. Conflict data scaling attempted but blocked by 32K output token limit and background agent permission constraints. ~167K tokens consumed with 0 dataset files produced. Recommending Manus AI handle bulk data generation in sandbox.
next_steps: Godel (Manus AI) to generate conflict datasets in sandbox (no token limits)
Claude Code to validate generated data schema compliance
Claude Code to implement SemanticConflictAnalyzer once data exists
Claude Code to run T-Score variance experiments on new data
handoffs.context: Conflict data scaling (22 → 500+ samples) requires bulk content generation that exceeds Claude Code's 32K output token limit per operation. Background agents also lack Write permissions. Recommended approach: Manus generates data, Claude validates and experiments.
